Patients randomly assign 1 3 treatment group . In study arm 1 , patient receive AZT plus ddC placebo . In study arm 2 , patient receive ddC plus AZT placebo capsule . In study arm 3 , patient receive ddC plus AZT . Patients see every week first 8 week monthly thereafter . Patients stratify HIV disease status , length time receive AZT , systemic local Pneumocystis carinii pneumonia ( PCP ) prophylaxis . Patients reach clinical AIDS-defining endpoint offer open-label combination therapy .
